maqras.text: 82|1|Ten ga, mijin ni sakeru toki,
82|2|Moroboshi ga chirasa reru toki,
82|3|sho Taiyo ga afure dasa reru toki,
82|4|hakaba ga abaka reru toki,
82|5|sorezore no tamashi wa, sudeni shita koto to,-go ni nokoshita koto o shiru.
82|6|Ningen yo, nani ga anata o megumi bukai nushi kara madowa se (somuka se)ta no ka.
82|7|Kare wa anata o sozo shi, katachi o atae,(kinsei no toreta karada ni) totonoe,
82|8|kare no okokoro no mama ni, keitai o anata ni atae rareta okatadearu.
82|9|Iya, anata gata wa shinpan o usodearu to iu.
82|10|Hontoni anata gata no ue ni wa 2-ri no kanshu (tenshi) ga iru ga,
82|11|kare-ra wa kedakai kiroku-sha de,
82|12|anata gata no shogyo o shitte iru.
82|13|Keiken'na-sha wa, kanarazu shifuku no naka ni iru.
82|14|Tsumi aru mono wa, kitto hi no naka ni ite,
82|15|shinpan no hi, kare-ra wa soko de yaka re,
82|16|soko kara, nogare rarenai.
82|17|Shinpan no hi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
82|18|Ittai shinpan no hi ga nande aru no ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
82|19|Sonohi, dono tamashi mo soto no tamashi no tame ni (yakudatsu) nani no ka mo motanai. Meirei wa, sonohi arra no mono.
83|1|Wazawai naru ka na,-ryo o herasu mono koso wa.
83|2|Kare-ra wa hito kara hakatte uketoru toki wa, jubun ni tori,
83|3|(aite ni watasu) ryo ya omo-sa o hakaru toki wa, sukunaku keiryo suru mono-tachidearu.
83|4|Korera no mono wa, yomigaeru koto o kangaenai no ka,
83|5|idainaru hi ni.
83|6|Sonohi,(subete no) ningen wa, ban'yu no omo no gozen ni tatsu node wanai ka.
83|7|Danjite ikenai. Batsu aru mono no kiroku wa, su~ijjin no naka ni (hokan shite) aru.
83|8|Su~ijjin ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
83|9|(Soko ni wa kanzen ni) kaka reta hitotsu no kiroku (ga aru).
83|10|Wazawai naru ka na, sonohi, usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi yo,
83|11|shinpan no hi o, usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi koso wa.
83|12|Kore o usodearu to itte kita mono wa, hangyaku-sha, tsumibito nihokanaranai.
83|13|Waga shirushi ga, kare-ra ni dokuju sa reta toki, kare-ra wa,`mukashi no monogatarida.' To itta.
83|14|Danjite sode wanai. Omou ni kare-ra no itta (aku) koto ga, sono kokoro no sabi to natta nodearu.
83|15|Iya, hontoni kare-ra wa, sonohi,-nushi (no o hikari) kara shimedasa reru.
83|16|Tsugini kare-ra wa, jigoku de kitto yaka reyou.
83|17|Sokode, kare-ra ni,`kore ga, anata gataga usodearu to itte kita kotodearu.' To tsuge rarerudearou.
83|18|Kore ni hikikae keiken'na-sha no kiroku wa, irri~tsuin no naka ni (hokan shite) aru.
83|19|Irri~tsuin ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
83|20|(Soko ni wa kanzen ni) kaka reta hitotsu no kiroku (ga ari),
83|21|(-nushi no) sokkinsha-tachi ga, sore o rissho suru.
83|22|Hontoni keiken'na-sha wa, kanarazu shifuku no naka ni ori,
83|23|kare-ra wa nedoko ni yotte, miwatasudearou.
83|24|Anata wa kare-ra no kao ni shifuku no kagayaki o mitomeyou.
83|25|Kare-ra wa, fuin sa reta junryona sake o sosoga reru.
83|26|Sono fuin wa jakodearu. Kore o motome netsubo suru mono ni netsubo sa se nasai.
83|27|Soreni wa tasunimu ga maze rareyou.
83|28|(Arra ni) chikai-sha-tachi (zenkosha) wa, sono izumi kara nomou.
83|29|Hontoni tsumi aru-sha-tachi wa, shinko suru mono o azawaratte ita.
83|30|Soshite kare-ra (shinja) no hata o sugiru to, tagaini (chosho shite)-me kuba seshi,
83|31|kazoku no moto e kaeru toki, waraigusa ni shita monodearu.
83|32|Kare-ra wa kare-ra (shinja) o mikakeru to,`hontoni korera no mono wa mayotte imasu.' To iu.
83|33|Daga kare-ra wa, kare-ra (shinja) no kanshi-sha to shite tsukawasa reta monode wanai.
83|34|Daga kono Ni~Tsu wa, shinko suru mono ga fushin-sha-tachi o warai,
83|35|kare-ra wa nedoko ni yotte, miwatasudearou.
83|36|Fushin-sha-tachi wa, sono okonai no mukui o uketadearou ka to.
